data.name: World of Warships - Haida Pack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside of Steam.

Haida is a Commonwealth destroyer with unusual properties for her Smoke Generator consumable. It takes a whole 90 seconds to set smoke screens, which means you can do it as you move. This feature makes Haida an excellent key area fighter. She's an unpredictable and difficult opponent for most other destroyers. But even without smoke screens, Haida can go a long way due to her rapid-firing and long-range artillery that deals a lot of damage, and her four fast-moving torpedoes with a range of 8 km.

Advantages:

  • Six rapid-firing 120-mm guns with good traverse speed and a firing range of 12.3 km. Despite the caliber, the damage from an HE shell is no less than that of Soviet 130-mm guns, which is 1,900 HP.
  • Unusual properties of the Smoke Generator consumable: 10-second smoke screen dispersion time and 90-second action time of the smoke generator. Haida can stay invisible while moving at ¼ speed.
  • Excellent concealment. Detectability range by sea — 6.5 km.
  • More credits earned in each battle and 50% more XP earned with the camouflage.

This bundle also contains:

  • Commander with 6 skill points
  • a slot in the Port
  • 2,000 Doubloons
  • 50 of each signal: Equal Speed Charlie London, Papa Papa, India Bravo Terrathree, Zulu, and Zulu Hotel

It takes a whole 90 seconds to set smoke screens, which means you can do it as you move. This feature makes Haida an excellent key area fighter. She's an unpredictable and difficult opponent for most other destroyers.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Czech, Japanese*, Polish*, Russian*, Thai, Turkish, Spanish - Spain, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Traditional Chinese*, Italian*, Simplified Chinese*, Ukrainian, Dutch*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 x86
  • Processor: Core2Duo 2.7 GHz, AMD Athlon II 3 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8800GT/9600GT, IntelHD 4000, NVIDIA GeForce 620M, AMD Radeon HD 4650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 9.0c
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570, AMD six-core 3,5 Ghz (AMD FX 6300)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti, GeForce GTX 560M, AMD Radeon R7 250
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 9.0c
